title: Neglected Dock Worker
description: They work at my Public Dock at Riva di Santa Maria Formosa Piccola, but our relationship is strained by their hunger and my apparent neglect of their basic needs. With a low TrustScore of 21.1 and minimal StrengthScore of 1.1, they likely view me as an uncaring employer who fails to provide adequate wages for sustenance, while I see them as just another worker among my many business interests.
